revised_title: Zoological Discoveries in Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez: Entomostraca Collections
tldr: The author presents a detailed analysis of the Entomostraca collected from Kerguelen Island and Rodriguez during the Transit of Venus Expeditions. The study focuses on the Ostracoda and Copepoda species, providing descriptions of their morphology, habitat, and distribution. The findings contribute to the understanding of these organisms and their role in marine ecosystems.
